rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with Art Deco motifs and a reception area to welcome visitors.
An open-plan living area combining space for sitting, dining, and social gatherings. Designed to maximize natural light and ventilation with large windows and sliding glass doors.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring stainless steel finishes and Art Deco accents.
Quiet library space with built-in bookshelves and ample natural lighting, ensuring a serene environment for reading.
Separate dining area adjacent to the living space, with views towards the garden.
Guest room designed with Art Deco style decor and ample storage, ensuring comfort for visitors.

openings.description: A decorative main entrance door aligning with Art Deco aesthetics.
North-facing window maximizing morning sunlight and ventilation.
Sliding glass door connecting the living area to an outdoor patio for enhanced natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring Art Deco details and a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Second bedroom with natural lighting, designed to cater to family needs.
Third bedroom optimized for comfort and privacy.
Fourth bedroom ensuring adequate space for joint family members.
Fifth bedroom with functional design for privacy and relaxation.
Sixth bedroom providing additional space in the joint family setup.
Dedicated home theater with soundproofing and ambient lighting for an immersive experience.
Additional study space to support work-from-home requirements.

openings.description: Private balcony door from the master bedroom for direct access to the outdoor space.
East-facing window ensuring afternoon sunlight and airflow.
